statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity > 70
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM Impact WHERE impact_type = 'Flood' AND severity > 5;
DELETE FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
